Name: Drain Runner
About the game: Venture into The Drain's treacherous waterways in this platforming-focused action roguelike! Play as Killbert, a stubborn criminal scavenger who braves The Drain at the promise of priceless treasures from a bygone era. Use his magnetic arm and killer instinct to survive the denizens that inhabit The Drain as you rail-grind and blast your way through a series of evocative trashpunk environments. Collect valuable items and complete objectives to improve your odds of survival! Core mechanics: - Rail grind on pipes to quickly get out of harms way and gain a positional advantage on enemies - Watch as The Drain itself evolves in real time during your playthrough - Attract and repulse objects with Killbert's magnetic arm - Complete objects and explore the environment to get powerful buffs - Master traversal to escape The Drain's intermittent floods as they wash pieces of the level away - Complete objectives within the time limit to progress to The Drain's final challenge Controls: WASD - Move Left Click - Shoot Right Click - Magnetize E (on ground) - Melee E (on rail) - Boost E (in air) - Ground Slam E (with magnetized item) - Repulse S (on rail) - Switch directions A/D - Switch orientation
